1.title: The Company Transition
1.plot: Dynasty Video Pro (DVP) has a company meeting to discuss the new direction their video production company is going in.

2.title: Balancing Issues
2.plot: Kyle Greenwood's first shoot for Dynasty Video Pro. Mitchel gives him a hard time, and constantly irritates him.

3.title: Red Heads and Bad Birthdays
3.plot: Jordie, threatened by Kyle's interest in Katie, threatens Kyle's future children (comedically of course). Nate makes a surprise appearance.

4.title: A Meeting with Gus
4.plot: Gus calls Kyle into his office for a meeting.

5.title: Can I Get a Foul Ball
5.plot: While shooting a baseball game, Kyle grows tired of a kid pestering him for a foul ball.

imdb.plot outline: When Kyle Greenwood is hired as a freelance camera operator for a local production company, he begins to learn what it truly means to be called a camera guy: make fun of the audience, and talk trash on the gigs. Kyle is a wanna be film maker/movie buff. Over the years of trying to go into the movie-making business, he has lost hope, and settled for the life of a freelance camera guy for local Production facilities. Quitting from most jobs, his roommate, Nate, hooks him up with a gig at Dynasty Video Pro. There he meets the highly comical and diverse team of camera guys who show him the ropes of what it means to be a true camera operator: Point the camera, make fun of people, and talk trash on the gigs.
imdb.title: Camera Guys
